vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μάκρο-θεν,
adverb from afar, [NT+3rd c.BC+]; of Time, from long since, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: from a distance, from far away afar
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
from a distance, from far away afar
far off, at a distance, from afar, from a distance, Mk. 8:3; 11:13; preceded by ἀπό, in the same sense, Mt. 26:58
vocabInfos._es_Definition: distante, de lejos,  lejano ; a la distancia, desde la distancia, en la distancia
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: nơi đằng xa; ở xa xa; ở đằng xa.
